languages.text: "Имя этой правительницы — Ведущая-вперед, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}. А все мы..." {n}, — старица обводит взглядом поселение, -{/n} "...мы дети огненной матери и бледного отца, что наблюдают за нами денно и сохраняют нощно. Верные слуги двуглавого Бога-орла, могучими крылами сокрывающего наши земли от бед. Мы — несгинувшие, живущие-в-лесах, дети земли и стражи храма Кетца Темера, первого из Звездорожденных, ступившего на девственные земли сего мира".

traits.locale_text: "Имя этой правительницы — Ведущая-вперед, о Звездорожденная. А все мы..." {n}, — старица обводит взглядом поселение, -{/n} "...мы дети огненной матери и бледного отца, что наблюдают за нами денно и сохраняют нощно. Верные слуги двуглавого Бога-орла, могучими крылами сокрывающего наши земли от бед. Мы — несгинувшие, живущие-в-лесах, дети земли и стражи храма Кетца-аль Хета, первого из Звездорожденных, ступившего на девственные земли сего мира".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, O Starborn. And all of us..." {n}The elder looks at the settlement.{/n} "...are the children of the fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Two-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with His wings. We are the ungone forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Temple of Quetza Temer — the first Starborn to have ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."
languages.original_text: "Имя этой правительницы — Ведущая-вперед, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}. А все мы..." {n}, — старица обводит взглядом поселение, -{/n} "...мы дети огненной матери и бледного отца, что наблюдают за нами денно и сохраняют нощно. Верные слуги двуглавого Бога-орла, могучими крылами сокрывающего наши земли от бед. Мы — несгинувшие, живущие-в-лесах, дети земли и стражи храма Кетца Темера, первого из Звездорожденных, ступившего на девственные земли сего мира".

traits.locale_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, o Starborn. And all of us..." {n}, — the elderly priestess looks at the settlement, -{/n} "...are the children of a fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Twin-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with his wings. We are the living forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Quetza Temer's temple — the first Starborn that had ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, o Starborn. languages.text: «El nombre de esta jefa es Jefa-de-Todos, oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas. Y nosotros...», {n}continúa la anciana, recorriendo el asentamiento con la mirada,{/n} «... somos los hijos de una madre de fuego y del pálido padre que velan por nosotros durante el día y nos amparan por las noches. Los fieles siervos del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas que protege nuestras tierras de toda adversidad con sus alas. Somos los moradores del bosque que permanecen en este mundo, guardianes del templo de Quetza Temer, el primer Hijo de las Estrellas que puso un pie en el suelo virgen de este mundo».
languages.original_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, O Starborn. And all of us..." {n}The elder looks at the settlement.{/n} "...are the children of the fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Two-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with His wings. We are the ungone forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Temple of Quetza Temer — the first Starborn to have ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."

traits.locale_text: «El nombre de esta jefa es Jefa-de-Todos, oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas. Y nosotros...»{n}, continúa la anciana sacerdotisa, haciendo un gesto para señalar al asentamiento{/n} «... somos los hijos de una madre de fuego y del pálido padre que velan por nosotros durante el día y nos amparan por las noches. Los fieles siervos del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas que protege nuestras tierras de toda adversidad con sus alas. Somos los moradores del bosque viviente y guardianes del templo de Quetza Temer, el primer Hijo de las Estrellas que puso un pie en el suelo virgen de este mundo».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: “噢，星裔，此酋长名叫‘先导’，我们都是……”{n}老妇人看了一眼村庄。{/n}“我们是暴怒之母与苍白之父的子嗣。他们在白天照顾我们，在夜晚保护我们。双头鹰神的忠实仆人用他的翅膀庇护我们的土地免遭不幸。我们是生活在森林中的大地之子，是格扎尔特默神庙的守护者。格扎尔特默是第一位踏上这片处女之地的星裔。”
languages.original_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, O Starborn. And all of us..." {n}The elder looks at the settlement.{/n} "...are the children of the fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Two-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with His wings. We are the ungone forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Temple of Quetza Temer — the first Starborn to have ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."

traits.locale_text: “噢，星裔，此酋长名叫‘先导’，我们都是……”{n}年迈的女祭司看了一眼村庄。{/n}“我们是暴怒之母与苍白之父的子嗣。他们在白天照顾我们，在夜晚保护我们。双头鹰神的忠实仆人用他的翅膀庇护我们的土地免遭不幸。我们是生活在森林中的大地之子，是格扎尔特默神庙的守护者。格扎尔特默是第一位踏上这片处女之地的星裔。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: « Cette dirigeante se nomme Mène-la-Marche, ô Stellaire. Et nous sommes les enfants d'une mère ardente qui veille sur nous pendant la journée et d'un père pâle qui nous garde la nuit, {n}explique-t-elle en se tournant vers le village.{/n} Nous sommes les fidèles serviteurs de l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes qui protège de Ses ailes nos terres contre le malheur. Nous sommes les enfants de la terre, habitants de la forêt vivante et gardiens du temple de Quetza Temer, le premier Stellaire à avoir foulé le sol vierge de ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, O Starborn. And all of us..." {n}The elder looks at the settlement.{/n} "...are the children of the fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Two-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with His wings. We are the ungone forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Temple of Quetza Temer — the first Starborn to have ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."

traits.locale_text: « Cette dirigeante se nomme Mène-la-Marche, ô Stellaire. Et nous sommes les enfants d'une mère ardente qui veille sur nous pendant la journée et d'un père pâle qui nous garde la nuit, {n}explique-t-elle en se tournant vers le village.{/n} Nous sommes les fidèles serviteurs de l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes qui protège de ses ailes nos terres contre le malheur. Nous sommes les enfants de la terre habitant la forêt vivante et les gardiens du temple de Quetza Temer, le premier Stellaire à avoir foulé le sol vierge de ce monde. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: 「スターボーンよ、この支配者の名は先導者。そして我々全ては…」{n}老人は集落を見やりながら言葉を紡ぐ{/n}「…昼は我らを見守り、夜は我らを守る、炎のような母と青白い父の子なり。その翼で我々の土地を災いから守ってくださる、双頭の鷲神の忠実なしもべ。我々は森に住み続ける大地の子であり、ケツァ・テメル…この土地に最初に足を踏み入れたスターボーンの神殿のガーディアンなのです」
languages.original_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, O Starborn. And all of us..." {n}The elder looks at the settlement.{/n} "...are the children of the fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Two-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with His wings. We are the ungone forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Temple of Quetza Temer — the first Starborn to have ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."

traits.locale_text: 「スターボーンよ、この支配者の名は先導者。そして我々全ては…」{n}老人は集落を見やりながら言葉を紡ぐ{/n}「…昼は我らを見守り、夜は我らを守る、炎のような母と青白い父の子なり。その翼で我々の土地を災いから守ってくださる、双頭の鷲神の忠実なしもべ。我々は森に住み続ける大地の子であり、ケツァ・テメル…この土地に最初に足を踏み入れたスターボーンの神殿のガーディアンなのです」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Der Name dieser Herrscherin lautet Geht-voran, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}. Und wir alle ..." {n}, die Alte blickt sich in der Siedlung um,{/n} "sind die Kinder einer feurigen Mutter und des blassen Vaters, die sich tagsüber um uns kümmern und uns nachts bewachen. Die treuen Diener des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes, der unsere Lande mit seinen Schwingen vor Unglück bewahrt. Wir sind die gebliebenen Wald-Kinder der Erde und die Hüter des Tempels des Quetza Temer — des ersten Sternengeborenen, der jemals einen Fuß auf die jungfräuliche Erde dieser Lande gesetzt hat."
languages.original_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, O Starborn. And all of us..." {n}The elder looks at the settlement.{/n} "...are the children of the fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Two-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with His wings. We are the ungone forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Temple of Quetza Temer — the first Starborn to have ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."

traits.locale_text: "Der Name dieser Herrscherin lautet Geht-voran, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}. Und wir alle"{n}, die alte Priesterin blickt sich in der Siedlung um,{/n} "sind die Kinder einer feurigen Mutter und des blassen Vaters, die sich tagsüber um uns kümmern und uns nachts bewachen. Die treuen Diener des zwillingsköpfigen Adler-Gottes, der unsere Lande mit seinen Schwingen vor Unglück bewahrt. Wir sind die im Wald lebenden Kinder der Erde und die Hüter des Tempels des Quetza Temer — des ersten Sternengeborenen, der jemals einen Fuß auf die jungfräuliche Erde dieser Lande gesetzt hat."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Ey Yıldızdoğan, bu hükümdarın adı Yol Açan'dır. Biz ise..." {n}İhtiyar, yerleşim yerine bakıyor.{/n} "Gündüzleri bizi gözeten, geceleriyse bizi koruyan yangın ana ve solgun atanın çocuklarıyız. Talihsizliklere karşı Kanatlarıyla topraklarımıza kalkan olan Çift Başlı Kartal Tanrı'nın sadık hizmetkârlarıyız. Toprağın ormanı yurt bilmiş kendinden emin çocukları, Quetza Temer tapınağının muhafızlarıyız. Bu diyarın el değmemiş topraklarına ayak basan ilk Yıldızdoğanlarız."
languages.original_text: "The name of this ruler is Leads-Ahead, O Starborn. And all of us..." {n}The elder looks at the settlement.{/n} "...are the children of the fiery mother and the pale father who look after us by day and guard us by night. The faithful servants of the Two-Headed Eagle-God who shields our lands from misfortune with His wings. We are the ungone forest-dwelling children of the earth and the guardians of the Temple of Quetza Temer — the first Starborn to have ever set foot on the virgin soil of this land."
